  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ContractCheckingIndexProxy.State
    State machine for proxies The logic of ContractCheckingIndexProxy hinges on the fact that all states are always entered and checked in this order (States may be skipped though): INIT > STARTING > STARTED > CLOSED Valid state transitions are: INIT -[:start]-> STARTING -[:implicit]-> STARTED -[:close|drop]-> CLOSED INIT -[:close] -> CLOSED Additionally, ContractCheckingIndexProxy keeps track of the number of open calls that started in STARTED state and are still running.
    IndexingService.State  
    IndexUpdateMode  
    PhaseTracker.Phase
